issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When I saw hive-schema-2.1.0.postgres.sql, I confirmed that "SCHEMA_VERSION" and "VERSION_COMMENT" were 2.0.0.
I change each value to 2.1.0.

comments.body: I believe you need to change the hive.version.shortname property in the top level pom as well.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12779612/HIVE-12752.1.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12779642 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
[~sinchii], could you address the test case failures? i think you may need to change some configuration for tez as well. Thanks.

Thank you for your advice.

In my environmemt, the methods of TestMiniTezCliDriver, TestMetaStoreMetrics, TestCliDriver and TestEncryptedHDFSCliDriver succeeded.
But TestSparkClient, TestHiveOperationType, TestSSL, TestSparkSessionManagerImpl, TestNegativiCliDriver was failed.
However, these tests were failed in condition not to apply a patch.
Therefore I think that it is not the problem of this patch.

[~sinchii], we need to fix the test failures for 
{code}
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniTezCliDriver.testCliDriver_cbo_windowing
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniTezCliDriver.testCliDriver_cross_product_check_2
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniTezCliDriver.testCliDriver_groupby3
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniTezCliDriver.testCliDriver_orc_merge1
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniTezCliDriver.testCliDriver_ptf_matchpath
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniTezCliDriver.testCliDriver_tez_schema_evolution
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniTezCliDriver.testCliDriver_union7
{code}
etc...If you believe this is not a problem, could you submit your patch again and make another QA run? Thanks.
In order to confirm the problem , I post the patch file again.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12779788/HIVE-12752.3.patch
